86249.summary: Some customers in the Downtown area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
86249.title: Jan 26 - Vancouver (Downtown) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

86247.summary: Some customers in the Westfort area of Thunder Bay are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
86247.title: Jan 26 - Thunder Bay (Westfort) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
